name: READING ROOM (VladimirKolkunov) (VladimirKolkunov)
description:
The main character, as always, falls asleep in his bed at home in the evening.

When he wakes up, he finds himself in a strange place, in which he, in his opinion, has never been before. It looked like an old library. Will the main character be able to find out where he really is?

INPUTS: 

WASD - MOVEMENT

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - INTERACT

TAB - OPEN/CLOSE INVENTORY

Languages: 

ENGLISH

RUSSIAN
